Class Space

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.manager.space.spec.subSpace.Space
Direct Known Subclasses:
UserSpace
public class Space
extends java.lang.Object

This class is an abstract representation of a Space for AppsGate

February 10, 2014
Version:
1.2.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
